title: Module 5 Quiz: Roles & How We Work

questions.question: Who is the Group Chief Executive Officer of Overdose?
questions.questionHtml: Who is the Group Chief Executive Officer of Overdose?

answers.text: Paul Pritchard
Todd Welling
Ryan Delaney
Laura Jackson

questions.feedback: Paul Pritchard is the Group Chief Executive Officer of Overdose. Todd Welling (co-founder) is Group Chief Strategy Officer, Ryan Delaney (co-founder) is Group Chief Experience Officer, and Laura Jackson is CEO Australia.
questions.feedbackHtml: Paul Pritchard is the Group Chief Executive Officer of Overdose. Todd Welling (co-founder) is Group Chief Strategy Officer, Ryan Delaney (co-founder) is Group Chief Experience Officer, and Laura Jackson is CEO Australia.

questions.question: Which of the following are discipline teams at Overdose? (Select all that apply)
questions.questionHtml: Which of the following are discipline teams at Overdose? (Select all that apply)

answers.text: Strategy
Experience (UX/UI)
Legal
Technology

questions.feedback: Overdose's main discipline teams include Strategy, Experience (UX/UI), Technology, Marketing, SEO, and Data & Analytics. Legal is not one of the core discipline teams.
questions.feedbackHtml: Overdose's main discipline teams include Strategy, Experience (UX/UI), Technology, Marketing, SEO, and Data & Analytics. Legal is not one of the core discipline teams.

questions.question: What is the key difference between Overdose's approach and traditional agency handoffs?
questions.questionHtml: What is the key difference between Overdose's approach and traditional agency handoffs?

answers.text: Integrated teams work simultaneously instead of sequential handoffs between silos
answers.textHtml: Integrated teams work simultaneously instead of sequential handoffs between silos

answers.text: We use more project managers to coordinate handoffs
answers.textHtml: We use more project managers to coordinate handoffs

answers.text: We have longer timelines between each phase
answers.textHtml: We have longer timelines between each phase

answers.text: Each discipline works completely independently

questions.feedback: Unlike traditional agencies with sequential handoffs (strategy → design → development → marketing), Overdose uses integrated teams where multiple disciplines engage simultaneously and collaborate continuously throughout projects.
questions.feedbackHtml: Unlike traditional agencies with sequential handoffs (strategy → design → development → marketing), Overdose uses integrated teams where multiple disciplines engage simultaneously and collaborate continuously throughout projects.

questions.question: What is Slack primarily used for at Overdose?
questions.questionHtml: What is Slack primarily used for at Overdose?

answers.text: Quick questions, informal discussion, and real-time team coordination
answers.textHtml: Quick questions, informal discussion, and real-time team coordination

answers.text: Client billing and invoicing
Storing all project files and documents
Performance reviews and HR matters

questions.feedback: Slack is our primary real-time communication platform, used for quick questions, informal discussions, and team coordination. Email is used for external communication and formal documentation.
questions.feedbackHtml: Slack is our primary real-time communication platform, used for quick questions, informal discussions, and team coordination. Email is used for external communication and formal documentation.

questions.question: Who leads the Australian operations at Overdose?
questions.questionHtml: Who leads the Australian operations at Overdose?

answers.text: Laura Jackson (CEO Australia)
Jenny Mesdag (CEO Americas)
Paul Pritchard (Group CEO)
Todd Welling (Group CSO)

questions.feedback: Laura Jackson is the CEO Australia, leading Australian operations including the Sydney, Melbourne, and Brisbane teams. Jenny Mesdag is CEO Americas.
questions.feedbackHtml: Laura Jackson is the CEO Australia, leading Australian operations including the Sydney, Melbourne, and Brisbane teams. Jenny Mesdag is CEO Americas.

questions.question: What is the correct principle for time tracking at Overdose?
questions.questionHtml: What is the correct principle for time tracking at Overdose?

answers.text: Track honestly and accurately, log time daily, use clear descriptions
answers.textHtml: Track honestly and accurately, log time daily, use clear descriptions

answers.text: Log all time at the end of each month
answers.textHtml: Log all time at the end of each month

answers.text: Only track time when working on billable projects
answers.textHtml: Only track time when working on billable projects

answers.text: Round up all time entries to the nearest hour
answers.textHtml: Round up all time entries to the nearest hour

questions.feedback: Time tracking at Overdose requires honesty and accuracy, daily logging (not waiting to remember later), clear descriptions, correct categorization, and asking if unsure how to log something.
questions.feedbackHtml: Time tracking at Overdose requires honesty and accuracy, daily logging (not waiting to remember later), clear descriptions, correct categorization, and asking if unsure how to log something.

questions.question: What role does the Strategy team play in client engagements?
questions.questionHtml: What role does the Strategy team play in client engagements?

answers.text: Leads discovery, develops commerce strategies, manages client relationships, and ensures all work aligns with business goals
answers.textHtml: Leads discovery, develops commerce strategies, manages client relationships, and ensures all work aligns with business goals

answers.text: Only handles billing and invoicing for clients
answers.textHtml: Only handles billing and invoicing for clients

answers.text: Designs all user interfaces and experiences
Manages the technical infrastructure

questions.feedback: The Strategy team leads client discovery, develops commerce strategies and roadmaps, manages ongoing client relationships, ensures all work aligns with business goals, and advises clients on priorities and investments.
questions.feedbackHtml: The Strategy team leads client discovery, develops commerce strategies and roadmaps, manages ongoing client relationships, ensures all work aligns with business goals, and advises clients on priorities and investments.

questions.question: What should you do when you're stuck with a tool at Overdose?
questions.questionHtml: What should you do when you're stuck with a tool at Overdose?

answers.text: Check documentation, ask your team, ask IT, search Slack — don't suffer in silence
answers.textHtml: Check documentation, ask your team, ask IT, search Slack — don't suffer in silence

answers.text: Figure it out yourself without asking for help
answers.textHtml: Figure it out yourself without asking for help

answers.text: Ignore the tool and find a workaround
answers.textHtml: Ignore the tool and find a workaround

answers.text: Wait until someone notices you're struggling

questions.feedback: When stuck with a tool, the best approach is: 1) Check documentation, 2) Ask your team, 3) Ask IT for access issues, 4) Search Slack, 5) Use training resources. Don't suffer in silence — it's faster to ask than to struggle.
questions.feedbackHtml: When stuck with a tool, the best approach is: 1) Check documentation, 2) Ask your team, 3) Ask IT for access issues, 4) Search Slack, 5) Use training resources. Don't suffer in silence — it's faster to ask than to struggle.
